name: Gastly
flavorText:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.

previous.name: Cloyster
previous.flavorText:
When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

next.name: Haunter
next.flavorText:
Because of its
ability to slip
through block walls, it is said
to be from an­
other dimension.

pokemon.name: Gengar
pokemon.flavorText:
Under a full moon,
this POKéMON
likes to mimic the shadows of
people and laugh
at their fright.
